Annotation.String: This is the schema definition for the Switchgear Metrics.
This resource shall be used to represent a power metrics resource for a Redfish implementation.
Power properties can be updated to change limits, exceptions and other writable properties.
The actual Firmware Revision of Switchgear.
The value of this property shall represent the actual Firmware Revision of Switchgear.
The actual Hardware Revision of Switchgear.
The value of this property shall represent the actual Hardware Revision of Switchgear.

This is the definition for Critical Boards.
These properties shall be the definition for an Critical Board array for a Redfish implementation.

This is the definition for Generator Paralleling Switchgear.
